did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Architecture Association of Cornell University records, [ca.1874]-1925.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: 3 manuscript volumes, Student Council minutes, contracts, bills, receipts, and cancelled checks, 1918-1925.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Contained in 3 manuscript volumes: Architect's Association of Cornell University record book, 1910-1925; Architectural Association records, 1874-1879, 1881; Architectural Association constitutions (1874, 1881, 1883) and Richardson Club constitution; and Student Council minutes, contracts, bills, receipts, and cancelled checks, 1918-1925.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Architecture Association of Cornell University. Records, #37-6-1629. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Collection consists of one box. Online guide unavailable.
